```

   Say: "Here's how to use the export package"

2. HELIX_MASTER_INDEX.md
   Say: "Here's the master index and quick reference"

3. HELIX_COMPLETE_EXPORT_PART1.md
   Say: "Part 1 - Foundation & Configuration"

4. HELIX_COMPLETE_EXPORT_PART2.md
   Say: "Part 2 - Agent System & Discord Bot"

5. HELIX_COMPLETE_EXPORT_PART3.md
   Say: "Part 3 - Services & Deployment"
```

**Then ask Grok anything!**
